getCost

public double getCost()
The cost is calculated based on different factors: - The condition. - The facilities. - The size. - The beds/rooms present (The less beds per room the more expensive). The values associated with the first three are stored in PriceMapping

Specified by:
getCost in class Location
Returns:
The cost if the cabin.
